articles.author: Megan White
articles.title: Next generation Formula 2 car revealed at Monza - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Formula 2 has revealed its next-generation car that the series will compete with from next year.
articles.content:
The series says the new car, which will be raced in the 2024, 2025 and 2026 seasons, is as close to an F1 car as possible in terms of safety and accessibility.
It is powered by a 3.4 litre turbo-cha… [+3325 chars]
